Kindy lo Queensland (Torres Strait – Creole)
Wanem kindy?
Kindergarten, wea wi kolem kindy, em i part taim ediukeisan program po pikinini po dat yia bipo em stat skul. Ip pikinini blo yu go po kindy program i go elpe em wen em plei, po lan po meke pren, ane elpe em po gede redi po stat skul.
Dem kindy program wanem da Queensland Government bin gri i gud wan, i gad fokas lo plei. Ane da erli childhood tisa uda go ranem i gad prapa treining. Dem kindy program i go bi wea dem erli childhood ediukei
... (1383 chars skipped) ... 
ad emergensi.
Da kindergarten blo yu go kipe dis inpomeisan seip. Yu go gad rait po luk ol dem rekord da kindergarten go kipem baut pikinini blo yu.
Suze kindy program
Ebri pikinini wea Queensland i gad rait po go po kindergarten wea i prapa wan, lo dat yia bipo em stat skul.
Dem Kindergarten program wanem da Queensland Government bin spik i prapa wan, gad diskain rul:
- dem erli childhood tisa uda gad da prapa treining, go yuze plei po tise pikinini. Dem tisa mas polo dem rul blo da government

... (1383 chars skipped) ...
mpla mait also gad rait po gede Commonwealth Government Child Care Subsidy.
Yu ken gede inpomeisan prom Centrelink po paindaut ip yu gad rait po gede sam dem Commonwealth Government subsidy.
Pikinini wea nada pamle o awa ane anti lugut em, em mait also gede ekstra mani sapot. Po gede mo inpomeisan kontakt da kindy blo yu ane den da Child Safety Service Centre.
Mo inpomeisan
Ip yu wande kontakt da Queensland Government ringap dempla lo 13 74 68
Search po ‘kindy’ wea www.qld.gov.au/earlyyearscount

Beauftragte für Partnerschaft, Entwicklung und Mission: Marlies Schlenz
Seit dem Ende der Neunzigerjahre besteht eine Partnerschaft zwischen dem Dekanatsbezirk Fürstenfeldbruck und dem Distrikt Karkar in Papua – Neuguinea(PNG). Ein Arbeitskreis (AK-PEM) aus Beauftragten und Interessierten der Kirchengemeinden betreut diese Partnerschaft. Dazu gehört u.a. die Unterstützung des Gaubin Hospitals, in dem zur Zeit das deutsche Ärzteehepaar Schwöbel arbeitet, Durchführung von Entwicklungsprojekten z.B
... (603 chars skipped) ... 
im distrik Karkar long PNG. Em i bin klostu long yia 2000 na dispele wok poroman i kamap. Em i gat sampela ol manmeri insait long distrik Fürstenfeldbruck, husait i laik wok long dispela wok poroman. Ol save bung long AK-PEM - mining bilong dispela emi "Grup bilong wok poroman, divelopmen na misen". AK-PEM i traim long mekim planti wok. Ol i laik sapotim Gaubin haus sik. Long Gaubin nau tupela dokta long Gemani i stap. Nem bilong tupela dokta man na dokta meri Schwöbel. AK-PEM i laik sapotim ol 
... (603 chars skipped) ...
Ol sampela manmeri bilong distrik Fürstenfeldbruck bin i go long PNG long 2004 na long 2013. Long yia 2009 ol pren long Karkar bin i kam long Gemani. Nau wokabaut namba tu i bai kamap: AK-PEM invaitim ol samela lain long Karkar long i kam long Gemani long yia 2008.
Kontakt:
Marlies Schlenz
Mail: dmschlenz@web.de
Tel. 08144/7354
In der linken Spalte können Sie zu einem Youtube-Video über die Gesundheitsarbeit auf Karkar und einer Radioaufzeichnung über die Spiritualität der Inselbewohner klicken.

Palemen bae i sitaon long Novemba
Nasonal Palemen blong Vanuatu bae i sidaon long eli Novemba.
Raymond Manuake, Clerk blong Palemen i saenem koling blong fes sitting blong namba 13 Palemen long Frade nekis wik.
Calling blong Palemen ia i hapen anda Palementri Sevises Akt CAP 306 we i givim 21 dei afta long gazet blong ofisol risalt blong eleksen.
Palemen bae i sitaon long Novemba 4 -7, 2022.
“Fes Sitting bambae hemi split long tu miting; Long Novemba 4 bambae i kat ol memba oli mekem ol promes blong olgeta afta long hemia oli saenem role(wok) blong Memba, afta prosid wetem eleksen blong spika blong Palemen,” Mr Manuake i talem.
“Afta yumi lukluk long eleksen blong ol deputi spika blong Palemen afta endem dei wetem eleksen blong Prime Minista.
“Ol wok ia we bae i tekem ples long Friday bambae hemi folem revised standing oda we hemi kam long fos long June 20, 2020.”
Mr Manuake i talem se seken sitting blong Palemen bae i stap long Monday Novemba 7.
“Blong establisim ol standard komiti blong hem mo apointem ol memba,” Mr Manuake i talem.
“Ofis blong clerk blong Palemen hemi mas mekem sua se notis hemi kasem ol niu elek memba 10 dei o moa bifo fes sitting i tekem ples.
Ofis blong clerk blong Palemen i talem se eni elek ripresentetiv we i no atendem fes sitting blong palemen long Novemba 4 blong mekem promes o mekem oath, bambae hemi jas mekem promes long namba 2 sitting we deit blong hem i nogat yet.

“Vernacular traces in the Crocodile Prize”
An essay in five parts
BY MICHAEL DOM WITH ENGLISH TRANSLATIONS BY ED BRUMBY
1. Maski salim tingting. Kirapim gen
LONG 2010, Keith Jackson AM na Philip Fitzpatrick, ibin kirapim tingting long kamapim nesenol literari kompetisen – Crocodile Prize. Mipela sampela man meri ibin raitim toktok igo ikam wantaim ol long blog site bilong Keith Jackson, em PNG Attitude, na mipela stap wanbel long tingting ol igatim. Mi iet isave givim tupela nem Grand Pukpuk.
So
... (4367 chars skipped) ... 
t tru long sanap olsem wanpela man Papua Niugini taim mi ridim ol dispela stori, tok-singsing, skelim tingting na tu ol novel-buk, we ol wankantri man-meri ol i putim wokmak. Tasol long nau mi pilim olsem lewa inogat strong na ai kiau bilong mi i raun nating antap long giraun nogut.
Bai mi lukluk igo bek gen long dispela ol gutpela wokmak bilong Papua Niugini litiritia na singautim tewel bilong tumbuna Pukpuk long halavim mi painim liklik nek bilong tokples long Crocodile Prize.
Dispela liklik n
... (4367 chars skipped) ...
ther tongues, my soul feels weak and my spirit wanders aimlessly on barren ground.
As I reflect again on the creativity of Papua New Guinea literature, I ask the spirit of the original Crocodile to help me find a voice for indigenous languages in the Crocodile Prize.
So that this small voice doesn’t disappear, I would hope that we can re-establish the Crocodile Prize, even more strongly. This work belongs to all Papua New Guineans and my appeal goes out to all writers: ‘This work must continue’.

Moning.
Mi laik stori long wanpela pren bilong mi. Pren bilong mi i bin lusim lotu bilong em na em i laik pas long narapela lotu. Em olsem na, bihain, ol sampela lida bilong bipo lotu bilong em i kam long haus bilong em. Ol i sindaun long haus na ol lida i tokim pren bilong mi olsem, “Lukim. Mipela rausim nem bilong yu long buk bilong mipela, na dispela i minim olsem, mipela rausim nem bilong yu long Buk bilong Laip i stap long heven. Sapos yu kam bek long lotu bilong mipela, orait mipela ken i 
... (2019 chars skipped) ... 
bilong Em long wok bilong Krais Jisas Bikpela bilong yumi. Olsem na, i no gat wanpela samting God i bin wokim inap tru long rausim yumi long dispela bikpela lavim bilong God. Rom 8:35-39.
Yumi mas klia olsem, ol manmeri God i kisim bek pinis, orait God i lavim ol. Pastaim God i lavim ol na long dispela as Em i wokim olgeta samting bilong kisim bek ol. God i lavim ol na Em i salim Jisas i kam na Jisas i dai long diwai kros bilong rausim na pinisim pe bilong sin bilong ol. God i lavim ol na Em i s
... (2019 chars skipped) ...
l sampela lotu i mekim. Nogat. Ol i no inap tru long rausim nem bilong yumi i bilipim na trastim feitful wok bilong Jisas. Long wanem, God yet i lavim yumi, na Em i kisim bek yumi long feitful wok bilong Jisas long diwai kros, na Holi Spirit i opim ai na ia na bel bilong yumi, bai yumi save na yumi tanim bel na bilipim na trastim na bihainim Jisas. Em olsem na, husat inap winim God na rausim yumi long lavim bilong God? Wanpela samting i no inap tru. Yumi seif olgeta long lavim bilong God.
Glenn.

Krais em i Helpim bilong yumi
1 Ol liklik pikinini bilong mi, mi raitim dispela tok long yupela, bai yupela i no ken mekim sin. Na sapos wanpela man i mekim sin, orait yumi gat Helpim bilong yumi, em i stap wantaim Papa. Em Jisas Krais, dispela man bilong mekim stretpela pasin olgeta.
2 Em yet i bin mekim wok bilong rausim sin bilong yumi. Na em i no mekim dispela wok bilong helpim yumi tasol. Nogat. Em i mekim bilong helpim olgeta manmeri i stap long graun.

ng yupela, na yupela i winim Satan pinis. Olsem na mi raitim dispela tok long yupela.

16 Yumi save, olgeta pasin bilong ol man bilong graun, em pasin bilong bel kirap na aigris na bikhet, ol dispela pasin i no kam long Papa. Nogat. Ol i pasin bilong graun tasol.

Supreme Court blong Vanuatu i aste tokaut long disisan blongen olsem foma praim minista, Charlot Salwai em ibin gilty long perjury or olsem em ibin giamanim kot.
Na kot bai tokaut long sentence or mekim save blongen long namba 3 day blong February, 2021.
Dispela keis we ibin karamapim tu ol sas olsem korapsen na bribery we former Opposition Leader husat inau Deputy Praim Minista, Ishmael Kalsakau em ibin bringim igo long kot.
Keis ia ibin kamap bihaim sampela tokwin long taim blong muvim wanpela motion blong no-confidence long Mr Salwai olsem Praim Minista long 2016.
Supreme Court ibin rausim pinis ol bribery na korapsen sas agensim Mr Salwai na sampela moa memba, tasol kot itok Mr Salwai i gilty long perjury.
Dr Tess Newton Cain em Project Leader blong Pacific Hub long Griffith Asia Institute long Brisbane na bai em tok klia moa long wanem we ibin kamap long kot.

Autonomous Bougainville Gavman Minista blong Peace Agreement na Referendum, Albert Punghau itok tede em laspela dei blong vout long independence referendum.
Em itok kaunting blong ol ballot bai em i stat long namba 8 long December na sampela dei bihain, bai Chairman blong Referendum Commission Bertie Ahern Bertie Ahern bai annaunsim risalt blong referendum.
Mr Punghau itok hamamas tu long hau olgeta wok blong referendum ibin kamap gut tru stat long Sarere namba 24 long Novemba.
Long wankain taim tu, PNG Electoral Commissioner Patilias Gamato itok em i satisfae wantaim Bougainville referendum vout long ol 20 provins long PNG.
Em itok olgeta ballot box bai kamap long Port Moresby long tumora long ol bae salim go long Buka long oli kauntim long hap wantaim tu ol ballot box blong ol vout long Australia na Solomon Islands.
Minista Albert Punghau itoktok moa long polling long Bougainville yet.

Erakor Golden Star mo Malampa Revivors bae i mit long wan frenli match long Korman stadium long 3pm tumoro aftenun.
Hemi festaem blong tufala top soka klab long Vanuatu ia bae i mit bageken mo frenli ia i part long trening preparesen from Oceania champions league long nekis manis.

Prime Ministers ball-Luganville
Luganville bae i hostem Prime Ministers ball long yia ia blong makem selebresen blong 42 Independens yia blong Vanuatu.
Hemi arenjmen we Luganville Municipal council oli mekem wetem Prime ministers ofis.
Selebresen blong independens bae i tekem ples long Unity Park blong tri dei, bae i stat long namba July 28-30 we hemi independens dei.
Jeaman blong Independence komiti mo semtaem Commissioner blong Luganville Municipal Council, John Botleng i talem se long July 30th afta long flag raising long Port Vila wan bigfala delegation blong Kavman bae oli kam long Luganville.
“Afta long flag raising bae ol bigman blong yumi i kasem Luganville blong Prime Minister’s ball; Hemi wan bigfala event we Luganville i stap pripea from,” Mr Botleng i talem.
“Yumi wantem event ia i kam daon long doa step wetem ol pipol.”
Mr Botleng i talem se Ofis blong Prime Minista nao i lukluk long logistic mo ol travel blong ol delegation. Hemi se nomata long amas mani we bambae oli spendem, hemi blong wan gud kos we kavman i kam daon long ol pipol blong hem.
Bambae i kat plante activiti long dei especiali ol difren kategori blong sports we bambae oli organisem, mo tu long naet wetem ol difren kaen show.

Ol lain husat i bin kisim baptais na kamap Witnes Bilong Jehova, tasol ol i no autim tok moa, na i no bung moa wantaim ol wanbilip, mipela i no save givim baksait long ol. Nogat. Mipela i laik helpim ol na kirapim laik bilong ol long tingim ol samting bilong lotu.
Mipela i no save rausim nating long kongrigesen wanpela husat i mekim bikpela rong. Tasol sapos wanpela Witnes husat i baptais pinis, i kirap insait long pasin bilong brukim ol lo bilong Baibel long stretpela pasin na i no tanim bel, orait kongrigesen bai rausim em o givim baksait long em. Baibel i tok klia: “Yupela i mas rausim man nogut i stap namel long yupela.
”—1 Korin 5:13.
Olsem wanem long man em kongrigesen i rausim em, tasol meri na ol pikinini bilong em ol i Witnes Bilong Jehova? Em bai pas gut yet wantaim meri pikinini bilong em na insait long ol samting famili i save mekim, tasol em i no pas wantaim famili long sait bilong lotu olsem bipo em i bin mekim.
Ol lain em kongrigesen i rausim ol, ol i ken kam long ol bung bilong lotu bilong mipela. Sapos ol i laik, ol inap kisim ol gutpela tok long ol elda bilong kongrigesen we inap helpim ol long pas gut wantaim God. Ol i laik helpim man long winim gen mak bilong stap olsem wanpela Witnes Bilong Jehova. Ol lain em kongrigesen i bin rausim ol, tasol nau ol i sakim pasin nogut na kamapim klia olsem ol i gat laik long bihainim ol lo bilong Baibel, orait ol inap kam bek insait long kongrigesen.

Jisas
Jisas i man i stap long kantri Juda (nau Israel) 2000 yia bipo. Nau ol i kolim olsem Jisas Krais(t) o Krais(t) tu.
Stori long Jisas i kam long baibel. Taim bilong laip bilong Jisas, no man o meri i bin raitim stori long en. Man o meri i raitim baibel ol i no bung Jisas. Olrait sampela man o meri ol i tok stori bilong baibel ol i tru, na sampela ol i tok ol i no tru. Sampela i tok sampela pat i tru na sampela pat i no tru.

EM WANPELA bilong ol liklik kantri long graun, na em i stap long ol maunten Alp namel long Swiselan na Ostria. Inap planti handret yia lain Kelt, Rhaetia, Rom na Alemani i stap long dispela ples. Klostu 60 pesen bilong populesen long Liktenstain i bilong lain Alemani, ol i kam sindaun long dispela ples inap 1,500 yia i go pinis.
Tok Jeman em bikpela tokples bilong kantri Liktenstain, tasol olgeta ples i gat ol tokples bilong ol yet. Ol man bilong dispela kantri i save kukim tupela kain kaikai, Tüarka-Rebel em kaikai ol i kukim wantaim kon, na Käsknöpfle em kaikai ol i redim wantaim sis na pasta.
Taim yu raun long dispela kantri, bai yu lukim ol maunten em sno i karamapim, ol veli i gat grinpela gras, ol gaden wain, na kain kain plaua na diwai samting. Olsem, yu inap painim klostu 50 narapela narapela wel okit long bus. Na tu, long Liktenstain i gat ol musium, ol bikpela haus tieta we ol man i mekim ol pilai samting, na ples bilong wokim wain. Ol turis i save kam raun long Liktenstain long taim bilong san na kol.
Kirap long yia 1920 samting, ol Witnes Bilong Jehova i givim bel long mekim wok lotu bilong ol long Liktenstain. Long nau i gat klostu 90 Witnes long dispela kantri, na ol i skulim ol asples lain na ol turis long ol tok bilong Baibel.

No drink mo draev-Polis
Polis bae i holem trak blong ol pipol we oli drink mo draev long Festive Season.
Long Friday ia, Polis operation Noel i talem se hemi holem taet sam trak mo bae oli rilisim long 2023.
Polis i talem se Operation ia mbai emi difren long ol ol operation blong ol pas yia from bae i kat rod blok mo bae oli mekem ol jek.
Wetem ol pas trabol blong man i draev taem i drong, polis mbai mekem ol jek long ol ples we man i save ko dring long hem, olsem ol bij raon long Efate.
Polis i apil i ko long pablik mo remindem pablik bakegen blong No draev taem yu stap anda long influence blong alcohol, No stanap long medel blong rod sipos yu drong mo usum footpath blong wokabaot, ol draeva oli no mas spid long rod mo oltaem drive slo, Part blong trak imas stap long gud kondisen, Trak i mas gat ol stret pepa blong road worthiness, Parens ino mas sendm wan smol pikinini i ko long sto. oltaem mas stap anda long supervision blong wan bigman, ol pablik transport draeva, olsem ol bus mo transport, i mas jenis long stret fasin blong dress ap mo werem kola shirt blong sevesem pablik.
Eni wan we hemi selebrete wetem wine mo i no behave mbai polis i arestem mo rilisim hem afta long January 3 2023.
Polis i kontinu blong rimaendem pablik blong tingting long sefti olsem wan prioriti bifo oli travel long rod o long solwota.
By Agnes Herbert.

Long naet bifo we Jisas i ded, hem i talem long ol disaepol blong hem se oli mas mekem memoriol blong tingbaot sakrefaes blong hem. Hem i talem long olgeta se: “Oltaem yufala i mas mekem samting ya blong tingbaot mi bakegen.”—Luk 22:19.
Aniveseri blong ded blong Jisas i stap long Mande 14 Eprel 2014, afta we san i godaon. Ol Witnes blong Jehova oli singaot yu, famle blong yu, mo ol fren blong yu, blong yufala i kam lesin long wan sotfala tok we bambae i kamaot long naet ya. Tok ya bambae i eksplenem from wanem ded blong Jisas i impoten tumas.
Miting ya bambae i stap long wan ples we i klosap long yu, mo hem i fri nomo.

Sam seasonal wokman blong Vanuatu long New Zealand i talem se extensen blong ol wok kontrak blong olgeta i alaoem olgeta blong mekem moa mani.
Steve Morris, wan seasonal wokman long New Zealand, i talem se longfala taem we oli bin spendem blong wok from COVID-19, i mekem sam wokman i mekem gud mani mo impruvum laef blong ol famili bak hom.

Title inscription in Tok Pisin (an official language of Papua New Guinea): Tupela Marit istap meri i gat sin na tupe—la igo long haus sin na Dokta I sekim blood bilong em na Dokta em I to kim meri long eye bilong man bilong em olsem em I gat AIDA man I tintin tasol natupela ikam long. Haus na man I paitim meri, 2006
Edited title inscription: Tupela marit i stap. Meri i gat sik na tupela i go long haus sik na dokta i sekim blut bilong em na dokta em i tokim meri long ai bilong man bilong em olsem em i gat AIDS. Man i tingting tasol na tupela i kam long haus na man i paitim meri, 2006
English translation: This is a married couple. The wife got sick, and they went to the hospital and the doctor checked her blood, and the doctor told the woman in the presence of her husband that she had AIDS. The husband was thoughtful until they got home and then he beat her, 2006

Ol Katolik, o Ketlik, o Popi ol i manmeri bilong wanpela lain bilong Kristen. Ol Kristen ol i manmeri ol i save lotuim Jisas, o Krais, na ol i tingting Jisas em i Got o Bikpela i kam long Graun.

Ambrym komuniti i kat wota
Ova 2000 pipol long faev komuniti long Ambrym oli kat akses long wota system.
Minista blong Lands mo Natural Risos, Honoroble Edward Nalyal, i stap long Ambrym long wik ia blong mekem opening blong ol wota system ia.
“West Ambrym hemi wan eria we i oltaem fesem ol longfala period blong dry sisen, “Minista Nalyal i talem.
“Mo tu i nokat ol wota saplae system blong wan long taem.
“Malekula hemi semak; hemi wan bigfala aelan mbe plante vilij long aelan ia i nokat gudfala akses blong wota.”
Eric Durpeire, Pacific Chief blong Vanuatu Field Ofis, i talem se oli glad tumas blong patna wetem Vanuatu Kavman long ol impoten initiative ia we bai hemi helpem sapotem ol famili espeseli long taem we pipol i nidim gudfala akses long wota blong washem hand.
New Zealand ripresentativ i talem se oli kat bigfala honor blong fandem wota project ia.
Akses long wota hemi wan problem long plante aelan espeseli ol rimot eria, hemi wan kol ong ol pipol/espeseli ol women blong oli mas kat akses ia, plante oli mas wokbaut long distans blong kasem wota, mo taem i kat disasta mo ples i drae hemi had blong faenem wota.
Projek ia hemi hapen tru long sapot fand we i kam long New Zealand kavman mo technical sapot blong United Nations Children fund.

Yu ting em . . .
God?
ol man?
Satan?
BAIBEL I TOK
SAMTING DISPELA INAP MEKIM LONG YU
YU TING YUMI INAP BILIP TRU LONG TOK BAIBEL I MEKIM?
Yes, i gat tripela as na yumi inap bilip olsem:
God i skelim pinis wok bos bilong Satan. Jehova i tingting strong long pinisim wok bilong Satan long kontrolim ol man. Em i tok promis long “bagarapim Satan,” na stretim bek olgeta samting em Satan i bin kamapim.—Hibru 2:14, Nupela Taim Baibel.
God i makim Jisas Krais long bosim graun. Jisas i no wankain long dispela man nogut i save tingim em yet na i bosim dispela graun long nau. God i tok promis long wok king Jisas bai mekim, olsem: “Em [Jisas] i save sori long ol manmeri i no gat strong na i stap rabis. . . . Sapos ol man nogut i laik daunim ol na bagarapim ol, em i save kisim bek ol.”—Song 72:13, 14.
God i no save giaman. Baibel i tok: “God i no inap giaman.” (Hibru 6:18) Taim Jehova i tok promis long mekim wanpela samting, i olsem em i mekim pinis dispela samting! (Aisaia 55:10, 11) “Em bai i rausim hetman bilong dispela graun.”—Jon 12:31.

Ol Melanesian pipal blong Southwest Pacific igat ol wan laen blong ol istap iet long sampla kantri long Asia.
Despla em toktok blong Dr Patrick Pikacha, wanpla saveman oa scientist blong Solomon Islands, husat iwok olsem Associate Lecturer long school of Biological Sciences long University blong Queensland long Brisbane.
Dr Pikacha itok long mun Oktoba long 2018 em iet wantem femili blong en ibin go raon long Malaysia we oli bin go long Taman Negara National Park na oli bin lukim na toktok wantem ol Melanesian pipal long hap.
Emi tok despla ol pipal i soim stori oa histri blong ol Negrito-Melanesian pipal em oli bin lusim Africa long taem bifo bifo tru na kam stap long Southwest Pacific.
Dr Pikacha itok despla tribe em oli kolim ol iet olsem ol Batek laen wan pisin ibin nambawan Negrito pipal long stap long Peninsular Malaysia.
Emi tok, olsem wanpla Melanesian man emi bin gat laik long go mekim wok painimaut long ol despla pipal, olsem na em na femili ibin go na painim ol despla pipal long ol bikbus long Malaysia.
sopos yu lukim ol despla pipal, oli luk olsem stret ol pipal blong, Papua New Guinea, New Caledonia, Solomon Islands na Vanuatu.
Dr Pikacha itok, ol haus blong ol Batek pipal i wan kaen tasol ol pipal blong Melananesian kantri isave bildim.

Komuniti i fixim rod long point blong Malapoa Estate
Parents blong Matautu point long Malapoa Estate i fixim rod long wiken ia blong ol pikinini i save kat akses long bus blong ko long skul.
Eli Dennis, wan lokol komuniti memba blong North East Malekula we i liv long eria ia, i talem se oli nosave wet long ol othoriti blong fixim rod from skul i stat mo ol pikinini blong olketa i mas ko long skul.

aenem bus mo hemia i rili had.”
Mr Dennis i talem se oli disaed blong fixim rod blong mekem akses blong ol pikinini i ko long skul i mo isi.
“I no ol pikinini nomo mbe mifala tu blong ko long town,” hemi talem.
Bus Draeva, Jeffrey Noel, i talem se rod long point blong Malapoa Estate i wan rod we i nogud.
“Rod i nokud mbe mifala i mas ko, mi mas talem se, blong bus i ron long smol hill long eria ia, samtaem bus i nosave ko nomo from rod i nogud evri wan,” hemi talem.
“Ol pipol long eria ia oli ri

en.
“Mi wan olfala man, mi nosave fixim rod mbe mi save help long vatu.”

Mr Noel i talem se “Long lukluk blong mi, naoia rod i gud lelbet blong bus i save ron long hem from komuniti i berem kraon long ol pothole.”
“Mbe kwesten nomo sapos wan bigfala ren i kambak bakeken, mi no tink bae ol kraon ia i save stap longtaem,” hemi talem.

Sabat Skul Baibel Stadi Long Tok Pisin Podcast
About This Show
Displa podkast stesin em blong halivim yu long harim long Tok Pisin wanem ol toktok ol raitim insait long Sabat Skul Baibel Stadi gaid leson buklet. Bikpla as tingting blo mipla lo kirapim displa wok em blong halivim ol lain blo mipla husait ino save long rid na rait. Bihain long em i kisim save na tingim tingim ol samting em i lainim, em i luksave olsem Baibel i no as bilong ol bilip bilong lotu Katolik. Nius Kirap! i stori wantaim em long olsem wanem em i kisim save long God tru.

Mi amamas olsem nau mi stap klostu long God
Yu bel hevi long disisen bilong yu?
Nogat tru! Mi amamas olsem nau mi stap klostu long God, long wanem, ol save mi kisim em Baibel i as bilong en, na i no pasin na tingting bilong ol man. Na tu, mi bilip tru long ol samting mi kisim save long en na mi amamas long skulim ol narapela long tok i tru bilong Baibel.

WASTAUA

Ded reit blong sik suga i inkris moa
Namba blong ol ded long Non-Communicable Disis hemi hae long 70 -75%.
Fika ia i kamaot long sik suga mo high blood presa.
Non-Communicable Disease Ofisa, Nurse Praktisina, John Taserei i talem se hemi wan hae namba we i sud wekem ap pipol.
“Hemi soem se 20% blong populasen long taem ia we oli survey long 2011-2012 oli kat sik suga; 31% oli kat hae blad presa mo 40-41 % oli gat gris insaed long bald blong olgeta,” Mr Taserei i talemaot.
“Fes sik hemi sik suga, afta ol sik blong heart we hemi blad presa we yumi faenem. Yumi kat tu cancer we yumi faenem we hemi sik blong lung taem man i sik lelbet.”
Wan mama we i stap salem kakae long Port Vila Maket, Anias Erick i talem se hemi had blong kakae helti kakae tete.
“VT10,000 kasem VT15,000 mani ia i smol, mifala long wan dei mifala i winim VT20,000 olsem be taem mifala i kaontem mani ia, mifala i glad lem, mani ia bae i ko vinis long sto nomo. Ol kakae olsem noodles, rice, mo chicken evri kakae ia bae mifala i tekem i ko long haos,” Mrs Erick i talemaot.
James Kapaken blong Tanna i talem se bifo oli kakae lokol kakae nomo from oli nogat mani.
“Naoia pipol i wok had mo mekem mani afta oli ko pem ol kakae long sto,” Mr Kapaken i talemaot.
Mr Taserei i talem se hae namba blong sugar long alcohol, tobako wetem kava i mekem man i sik mo ded.
Hemi talem se pipol i sud kakae smol rice mo plante vegetable blong help katem daon namba blong ded we i kamaot long sik suga mo hae blad presa.

Wan kastom jif i sud kat graon mo ol risos blong hem, i sud kat ol pipol blong hem mo las wan kat wan tredisenal farea blong tijim ol pipol blong holem taet pis mo unity oltaem.

Ol seasonal wokman long kwarentin i wari
Sam seasonal wokman long kwarentin i apil long Kavman blong lukluk bak long disisen blong ol repatriates i pem own kwarentin.
Wan seasonal wokman blong Australia we i no wantem nem blong hem i kamaot, i talem se hem ia i sas tumas long olgeta.
Hem i talem se VT127,000 kost blong kwarentin blong 14 dei ia bae oli nosave pem nomo.
“Mi askem kavman blong lukluk bak long disisen ia blong helpem mifala long wan jip praes,” hemi talem.

... (1241 chars skipped) ... 
pem own kwarentin blong olgeta stat long April.

“Kavman bae i no kontinu blong tekemap ol kost olsem, bae yumi mekem nomo long ol imejensi we pipol i no awea long eniting, be naoia wetem hemia yumi bin mekem i klia finis long ol seasonal wokman blong yumi long Australia mo New Zealand,” Mr Tamata i t
... (1241 chars skipped) ...
avman i save lukluk long sam nara wei blong sapotem ol lokol blong pem kwarentin kost ia from i sas tumas,” hemi talem.

Monday, May 5, 2014
Long thursday 1st Mei 2014, Canberra Vanuatu Students Association wetem some member blong Vanuatu Community long Canberra i hostem wan smol kaikai blong feawelem Mr Lionel Warimavute, Senia Desk Ofisa - Europe Divisen blong Vanuatu Foren Affeas Depatmen we hem i stap long wei blong hem blong go long Europe.
Vanuatu Foren Affeas departmen i postem Mr Warimavute i go long Brussels blong wan period blong 10 manis olsem wan staff blong Embassy blong Vanuatu long Brussels.
Ambassador blong Vanuatu long Brussels naoia hemi H.E Roy Mickey Joy.
President blong Canberra Vanuatu Student Association, Mr Sylvain Kalsakau, i congratuletem Mr Warimavute long behalf blong ol students long niufala posting blong hem.
Mr Kalsakau i olsem encouragem Mr Warimavute blong continue blong givim best blong hem blong supportem H.E Roy Mickey Joy mo blong continue blong defendent interest blong nation oltaem long work blong hem taem hem i stap long Brussels.
Naet ia i end wetem smol kaikai mo smol kava long fasin blong yumi ol man place.

Pablik Rilesen Ofisa (PRO) blong gavman, Kierry
Manassah, I talemaot se big wari I stap
yet tede insaed long Vanuatu Broadcasting
mo Television Coroporation (VBTC).
Long wan pablik stetmen blong hem, PRO
Manassah I talem se I no problem blong redio
caverage nomo we fulap aelan long
Vanuatu I no save kasem seves blong radio,
be hem I talem se nara issue hem I VBTC I
gat tumas staff.
Bifo krismas finis, Bod anda long lidaship
blong jealady Jennifer Kausei, I bin infoemem
ol staff blong VBTC finis se bambae I
gat wan restructuring, mo wan wan long olgeta
I save aplae bakeken sapos I wantem
kontinu blong wok wetem VBTC.
Mista Manassah I talem se bambae I gat
wan task force I visitim VBTC along ol wik
we I kam blong lukluk bak wok blong wan
wan staff mo wanem kampani ia I stap provaedem
I go long pablik. Bambae task force
I lukluk tu long saed blong ol liscence we I
stap givimaot mo regulesen blong VBTC.
Yumi Toktok Niuspepa I andastan se wan
nara issue tu we I need blong lukluk long
hem hem I posisen blong General Manager,
afta we six yia kontrak blong GM Fred Vurobaravu
I finis long las yia.
Gavman wetem Bod blong VBTC I stap lukluk
blong apoenem wan GM we I gat capacity
blong draevem big kampani blong television
mo broadcasting ia forward.
Gavman I stap givim 45 milien Vatu grant
evri yia I go long VBTC.

This poem illustrates how narrow gender views in Vanuatu can be harmful.
Ol papa mo ol boe blo Vanuatu, strong tingting blong masculinity emi stap hurtem yufala tu.
Sapos you wantem yu save laekem blo kivim hug.
Sapos yu wantem storian wetem mama blo yu, ol anti, ol sista, hemi oraet!
Sapos yu wantem wokbaot wetem ol fren blo yu we oli ol gel, hemi oraet!
Wan papa hemi gat responsibiliti blo lavem mo tekem kea lo famili blong hem.
Sapos yu laekem blo kuk, hemi oraet.
Hemi oraet sapos yu no kakai
... (302 chars skipped) ... 
maot ol feeling blo yu lo ol fren blo yu, hemi oraet!
Sapos yu wantem krae lo solda blo fren, blo mama, blo brata, blo sista, blo eni wan… Hemi oraet nomo.
Hemi oraet blo kat emosen. God hemi kivim yu evri kaen emosen, from wanem yu no enjoem?Sapos yu no strong… Hemi oraet!
Sapos yu no save hao blo fixim trak o bildim wan haos, hemi oraet tu.
Sapos yu no laekem strong fasin, hemi oraet.
Sapos yu no wantem go aot wetem fulap woman, be yu laekem blo frenem wan nomo, hemi oraet.
Hemi oraet sapos yu
... (302 chars skipped) ...
ng masculinity.
This poem was written by Stephanie Ephraim Lekal, Gender Justice & Livelihoods Program Intern at Oxfam in Vanuatu and originally published on their Facebook page.
Photo credit: Groovy Banana
Oxfam in Vanuatu’s Gender Justice and Livelihoods program supports community members and especially women, youth, people with disability and people identifying as LGBTQI+ to increase their economic opportunities and address harmful gender norms that are barriers to their economic empowerment.

Moa konsolteisen long ritaemen age – Napuat
Jenis long ritaemen age i sud gat moa konsolteisen long hem, foma Internal Affairs Minista i talem.
Vanuatu Palamen i mekem jenis long ritaemen age we i bin stap long 55, naoia oli muvum i ko long 60. Palamen i mekem jenis ia mo pasem long yestete tru long Bill blong Statute Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act No. blong 2020, long Palamen Haus long Port Vila.
Mbe memba blong Palamen blong Tanna mo sem taem foma Minista blong Internal Affairs, Andrew Nap
... (724 chars skipped) ... 
hem i difren long yumi long Vanuatu.
“Wanem we yumi nid blong pasem long ples ia bae hem i mas be releven long laef style blong yumi mo konteks blong yumi long Vanuatu.”
Deputi Praem Minista, Alatoi Ishmael Kalsakau, we hemi putum jenis ia i talem se risen blong i gat jenis ia hemi from ol developmen we kaontri hemi stap go tru long hem naoia.
Hemi talem se wetem helt seves we i stap long kaontri, i gat bigfala janis se man i save live longtaem.
“Infac yumi save plante pipol we oli save stap yet
... (724 chars skipped) ...
nis blong ol pipol i save laef long hem.”
Minista blo Finance, Johny Koanapo, i talem se hemi wan polisi blong kavman naoia blong lukluk long komitmen blong ol wokman espeseli long entitlement benefit blong olgeta.
VBTC i andastanem se bae niu jenis ia i kam into ifek taem we State Law hemi gazetem.
Olgeta kavman bill we i pas long palemen tedei mo yestedei hemi karem sapot blong 29 MP nomo afta we 22 MP blong oposisen oli saspen i stap. 22 Oposisen MP ia bae oli atendem bak Palamen long tumoro.

French President bai visitim New Caledonia.
Updated
Oli ting, President, Nicholas Sarkoxy bilong France, bai tokaut long ol samting em gavman bilong em bai mekim bilong pasim crime long New Caledonia.

Em i tok, Mr Sarkozy bai karim aut wanpela inouguration ceremony long Noumea na oli ting bai tokaut long ol sampela wei bilong tekalim kraim.

Ripablik blong Vanuatu
Ripablik blong Vanuatu (République du Vanuatu) i wan kaontri long pasifik we olgeta i tok tok long Bislama. Ol tu narafala ofisel langwis blong kantri ia em i inglis mo franis. I gat klosap 115 aelan langwis we manples blong Vanuatu i toktok long hem. Kapital blong hem i Port Vila. Hemi independent aot blong British mo Franis long 30 July 1980.
Hed blong Stet: Iolu Abil
Praem Minista: Edward Natapei

MI BON long 1927 long Wakaw, Saskatchewan, em wanpela liklik taun long Kanada. Mi gat 4-pela brata na 3-pela susa, olsem na taim mi liklik yet, mi lain pinis long i stap wantaim planti manmeri.
Long ol yia bihain long 1930, bikpela hevi i kamap long sait bilong mani, na dispela i putim hevi long famili. Mipela i no gat planti mani, tasol mipela i gat kaikai. Mipela i gat sampela mama kakaruk na wanpela bulmakau, olsem na oltaim mipela i gat rot long kisim kiau, milk, sis, na bata. Mipela olgeta 
... (6952 chars skipped) ... 
la long famili bilong em i kam insait long tok i tru, em i kamap painia bihain long 2-pela yia. Olsem na em i stap insait long fultaim sevis inap 67 yia olgeta.
Long Julai 1946, taim Ted i gat 20 krismas, em i grediuet long namba 7 klas bilong Wastaua Baibel Skul Bilong Gileat. Bihain, em i mekim wok olsem wasman raun long Cleveland, Ohio. Bihain long 4-pela yia, ol i makim em long mekim wok olsem brens sevan long Australia.
Ted i stap long kibung i kamap long Nuremberg, Jemani, na mitupela i lu
... (6952 chars skipped) ...
sista long Betel na long kongrigesen. Betel em ples we yu mas taitim bun long mekim wok bilong God, tasol yu bai kisim amamas long dispela rot. Mi laikim yet wok bilong autim tok. Mi save pilim taiet, olsem na mi no inap sanap longpela taim, tasol mi save amamas tru long autim tok long rot na mekim ol Baibel stadi.
Taim mi lukim ol bikpela hevi i kamap long graun, mi amamas tru olsem mi inap mekim wok bilong Jehova wantaim gutpela poroman marit! Jehova i givim planti blesing long mi.—Snd. 10:22.

namba 2 blong October.

INAP olsem 800 yia i go pinis, ol lain Maori i raun inap planti tausen kilomita long solwara na ol i go kamap long Nu Silan. Em i olsem bikpela ples daun we i luk narapela kain tru long ol liklik ailan bilong Polinesia we ol i bin lusim. Dispela ples i gat planti sno, maunten, ol traipela hap ais i trip long solwara, na hot wara i sut i kamaut long graun. Inap 500 yia bihain, ol lain bilong narapela skin kala i kam kamap—ol i kam longwe tru long Yurop. Long nau, planti manmeri bilong Nu Silan i bihainim kalsa bilong lain Polinesia na lain Yurop bilong bipo. Inap 90 pesen bilong ol manmeri i stap long ol biktaun. Long olgeta narapela biktaun long hap saut bilong graun, biktaun Wellington i stap klostu moa long Saut Pol.
I gat kain kain samting i mekim ples i luk nais tru, olsem na maski dispela ples i stap longwe tru, inap olsem 3 milion turis i save go long Nu Silan long olgeta yia.
Nu Silan i gat kain kain animal, na planti moa bilong ol pisin i save wokabaut tasol long graun. Em ples bilong tuatara, em wanpela kain palai we inap stap laip inap olsem 100 yia! Na tu, i gat sampela kain blak bokis na sampela traipela animal bilong solwara, na ol weil na ol dolfin.
Ol Witnes Bilong Jehova i mekim wok lotu bilong ol long Nu Silan inap olsem 120 yia. Ol i yusim 19 tokples long skulim ol manmeri long Baibel—sampela em tokples bilong ol ailan bilong Polinesia, olsem tokples bilong Niue, Rarotonga, Samoa, na Tonga.

Bai yu makim wanem bekim?
LAIP I KAMAP LONG ROT BILONG ․․․․․.
EVOLUSEN
KRIETA
SAMPELA man inap tok ol man i bilip long saiens bai makim “evolusen” na ol man bilong lotu bai makim “krieta.”
Tasol dispela tingting i no stret.
Wanpela profesa bilong baioloji long McMaster University long Kanada, em Rama Singh i tok: “Ol bikman bilong lotu na planti man i gat bikpela save i no wanbel long dispela bilip bilong evolusen.”
Tingim Gerard, em wanpela profesa bilong mekim wok painimaut long ol binatang. Em i stori long save em i kisim long bilip bilong evolusen taim em i stap long kolis. Em i tok: “Long taim bilong eksem, mi save raitim ol tok em ol tisa bilong mi bai wanbel long en, tasol mi no bilip long evolusen.”
Bilong wanem sampela saientis i no bilip olsem ol samting i gat laip i kamap long rot bilong evolusen? Bilong bekim dispela askim, yumi ken skelim tupela askim em planti saveman i hatwok long save gut long en. (1) Laip i kamap olsem wanem? na (2) Laip i kamap long rot bilong evolusen?

Gavman bilong James Marape i pasim tok pinis na ol bai sasim ol timba kampani long baim 59 pesen takis igo long gavman taim ol i putim ol diwai bilong yumi long sip na karim igo ovasis.
Bifo ol kampani i save baim tasol 32.5 pesen.
Dispela bai i wok taim PNG Kastams i putim aut wanpela toksave pepa.
Dispela ol kampani i save katim diwai i ino hamamas olsem dispela bai i mekim ol i baim traipela mani na ol i ken pasim bisnis bilong ol.
Ol i tok tu olsem ol papa graun bai ino kisim gutpela royolti mani.
Tasol Forest Minista Solan Mirim na PNG Forest Atoriti boss Tunou Sabuin i mekim strongpela toktok dispela wik olsem gavman bai igo het na sasim dispela niupela takis.
Sabuin i tok aut tu olsem planti taim bipo em ol kampani bilong katim diwai i save mekim planti mani, nau em taim bilong gavman na papa graun.
Em i tok tu olsem maski sapos ol kampani i tok ol bai lusim kantri long dispela niupela takis, em bai no inap kamap.
Sabuin i tok planti taim bipo ol i tok long go tasol ol ino go.
Minista Mirisim i laikim ol papa graun i mas ripot long PNGFA opis sapos ol kampani i ronowe bikos long niupela takis ya.
Dispela bai soim husait tru i gutpela kampani long wok wantaim na husait em ol ino gutpela kampani.
Wantaim niupela takis, gavman nau i lukluk long kamapim mani olsem K 400 igo long K 450 million long wanwan ya.

Ol wok blong Papua New Guinea gavman long putim nem blong olgeta pipol long kantri insait long komputa wantaim piksa blong ol em i wok long bungim heve.
Ol pipol long PNG bai nidim dispela ID Card long bai oli nap vout long ol ileksan, tasol ikam inap nau, samting olsem haf milion pipol tasol igat nem we i stap pinis long kompiuta.
Niusman blong ABC long Port Moresby, Bethanie Harriman i ripot olsem ol masin blong printim on identity card i bagarap, na dispela wok igo slou tumas.
Em i tok planti pipol i save sanap long lain longpela taim long lukim ol ofisa long prosesim card blong ol na oli les pinis.
Bethanie i tok, sampela pipol i wok long komplen tu olsem sampela ofisa i save askim moni long ol bai prosesim card blong ol.

Waigani Committal Kot long Port Moresby tete morning itokaut olsem man husat oli sutim tok ibin kilim dai late Jenelyn Kennedy long last wik, inau go long Bomana haus kalabus inap long nex harim kot blong en long namba 30 dei blong mun July.
Kot i harim tete morning olsem namel long namba 18 na 23 dei blong displa mun, suspect Bospi Kaiwi ibin kilim dai meri blong en long rum blong en long haus long Port Moresby.
Long displa wik tu, ol femili blong Late Jenelyn Kennedy, husait igat olsem 19pla krismas, ibin toktok strong long lukim olsem lo imas mekim save long displa suspect na oli bai nonap kisim wanpla bel kol moni long dai blong pikinini blong ol.
Emi bin wanpla bikpla case we ibin kirapim planti paitim toktok o debate long social media blong facebook, we planti ol man meri na ol yangpla isoim bikpla wari na sore long dai blong late, Jenelyn Kennedy, husait em bodi blong en em oli lusim long 3mile hausik long Tundei long wiki go pinis.

Lingua Franca Nova, hemi wan tokples we oli kolim Elefen tu, em i wan tokples we oli mekem wantem man olsem C. George Boeree blong Shippensburg University long Pennsylvania anfala hemi bin moa oli wok long hem from olgeta pipol we oli yusum. Wanfala olgeta wod blong hem i stap long langguis we oli gat praimeri long wanfala Romance tokples, hemi inkludim French, Italian, Portuguese, Spanish, moe Catalan. 1. Bilong wanem God i oganaisim lain Israel bilong bipo?
God i oganaisim ol tumbuna pikinini bilong Abraham i kamap wanpela lain na i givim ol lo long ol. Em i kolim dispela lain olsem “Israel,” na i givim wok long ol long lukautim lotu i tru na tok bilong Em. (Song 147:19, 20) Olsem na olgeta manmeri inap kisim blesing long rot bilong lain Israel.
God i makim lain Israel long kamap ol witnes bilong em. Ol samting i bin painim ol long bipo, i kamapim klia olsem pasin bilong bihainim ol lo bilong
... (863 chars skipped) ... 
ong Baibel long ol miting bilong ol.
3. Oganaisesen bilong ol Witnes Bilong Jehova long nau i bin kirap olsem wanem?
Long 1870 samting, wanpela liklik lain Baibel sumatin i kirap long kisim gen stretpela save long ol tok i tru bilong Baibel. Ol i save olsem Jisas i bin oganaisim kongrigesen Kristen bilong autim tok, olsem na ol i kirapim wok bilong autim tok bilong Kingdom long olgeta hap. Long 1931, ol i kisim nem olsem ol Witnes Bilong Jehova.
4. Olsem wanem ol Witnes Bilong Jehova i oganaisim

im, mipela i save autim tok long ol haus. (Aposel 20:20) Na tu, mipela i amamas long mekim Baibel stadi wantaim ol man i laikim tok i tru. Tasol ol Witnes Bilong Jehova i no wanpela oganaisesen tasol, nogat. Mipela i wanpela famili i gat gutpela Papa. Mipela i stap olsem ol brata na sista husat i save tingim tru narapela narapela. (2 Tesalonaika 1:3) Lain bilong Jehova i mekim wok bilong amamasim God na helpim ol narapela, olsem na ol i wanpela famili i stap amamas tru, winim ol narapela famili.

?From wanem i gat ol profet tok long Baebol?
Long Baebol, i gat plante profet tok. Be i no gat wan man we i save talemaot fiuja. Taswe, ol profet tok blong Baebol we oli kamtru finis, oli soemaot se Baebol i kamaot long God.—Ridim Josua 23:14; 2 Pita 1:20, 21.
Ol profet tok blong Baebol we oli kamtru finis, oli mekem se yumi bilif long ol samting we God i talem. (Hibrus 11:1) Mo ol profet tok ya oli mekem we yumi trastem ol gudfala promes blong God long fiuja. Taswe, yumi putum tingting blong yumi i stap strong long ol promes ya.—Ridim Ol Sam 37:29; Rom 15:4.
?Ol profet tok ya oli givhan long yumi olsem wanem?
Sam profet tok blong Baebol oli givim woning long ol man blong God se oli mas mekem wan samting. Yu traem tingbaot ol Kristin bifo. Taem oli luk we sam profet tok oli kamtru, oli aot long Jerusalem oli ronwe. Nao taem ol ami oli kam spolem taon ya from we plante man oli no wantem folem Jisas, be ol Kristin oli stap sef nomo long wan ples we i longwe long Jerusalem.—Ridim Luk 21:20-22.
Long taem blong yumi, ol profet tok we oli kamtru oli soemaot se i no longtaem, Kingdom blong God bambae i finisim ol gavman blong man. (Daniel 2:44; Luk 21:31) Taswe, i impoten tumas we yumi evriwan i mas mekem wan samting kwiktaem, nao Jisas Kraes, King ya we God i putumap, bambae i glad long yumi.—Ridim Luk 21:34-36.

Mr Liu i talem se China i redi blong ofarem moa trening long ol best atlet blong Vanuatu blong oli save winim ol medal long taem blong gem ia.
Niu ambassada blong China, hemi mekem tok tok ia taem we hemi bin mit wetem praem minista, Charlot Salwai long yestede (Tosde).
Mr Liu i talem se hemi bin talem se tok tok ia taem we hemi bin visitim minista blong sports, Nato Taiwia.
Hemi talem long Praem Minista Salwai se oli save sendem ol best atlet blong Vanuatu blong oli go karem moa trening long wan manis long China bifo gem.
Niufala stedium blong Port Vila we istap long Korman, gavman blong China nao, hemi buildim mo Vanuatu nao, bae hemi hostem Saut Pacific mini gem ia.
Gavman blong Jaena hemi no assurem Vanuatu nomo long kaen trening olsem.
Long Samoa, Jaena I bin sendem 20 coach long 2006 igo trenem ol athlete blong olgeta from SP Games.
Kasem naoia, ol wok blong bildim ol ples blong plei blong athlete long Korman ino stat yet. Olfala stedium we istap long Korman ya mo stap nogud istap ya, wan praevet kampani I pulum daon finis bifo long taem blong saeklon Pam las yia.
Last yia long manis June, Pasifik Games Kaonsel I asurem evriwan se emi hapi wetem ol progress we I stap lid igo blong mekem I posibol blong Vanuatu I hostem SP Games ya nekis yia.
2017 Pasifik Mini Games ya bae hemi olsem namba 10 edisen blong hem.

SOLOMONS POLIS TOKTOK LONG WEATHER COAST
MELBOURNE, Australia (Radio Australia, June 6) - Long Solomon Islands, polis i tok,i luk olsem taim ol polis ibin lusim Weather Coast long Guadalcanal, ol rebel ibin kamapim ol nupela pait long dispela eria.
Polis i wok long kisim ol toktok ikam long moa long 80 pipol bilong ol viles insait long Duidui Ward em ol ibin muvim ol igo long Honiara.
Polis i tok, ating tupela pipol ibin dai insait long ol pait em rebel lida Harold Keke na ol sapota bilong em ibin kamapim.
Direkta bilong Kriminal Investigesins,Jackson Ofu,itok, i luk olsem ol rebel i kamapim dispela pait long ol viles pipol husat i halivim polis insait long wok bilong ol bilong traim holim-pasim Harold Keke.
June 6, 2003
Radio Australia: www.abc.net.au/ra
